Reviews.Title: Droid Razr Maxx Review - Great everyday device
Reviews.Author: ether813
Reviews.Content: This was for the driod razr maxx not just the Droid Razr, excellent product great build quality and most importantly, a 4G LTE phone that can actually last a day and a half with the user doing much tweaking. I can go 16 to 17 hours and still have 70% battery left. Where this really helps is i can just leave bluetooth on all day, and wifi on all day and leave the gps on all day, which all make the phone more productivity, especially if you take the time to configure smartactions, to turn off your ringer when you reach a certain location or to switch off your mobile data and just use wifi when you reach a certain location, or switch to VIP calling at a certain time and a certain place. It is thicker than the original droid razr but still just as thin if not thinner than most other smartphones on the market today. Only drawback is the screen resolution is not hd, and the camera could be faster with the shutter.Motorola DROID RAZR MAXX 4G Android Phone, Black 32GB  (Verizon Wireless)

Reviews.Title: PERFECT!!!
Reviews.Author: Thinker "Simplify"
Reviews.Content: The phone was exactly what I expected and more.  It runs perfectly and the condition exceeds the description of like new.  There was not a scratch on it! The seller shipped with in the period requested and responded to every question that I asked with respect and in a timely manner!!!!!  I would buy from this seller again!!!

Reviews.Title: battery life sucks!
Reviews.Author: jessica flores
Reviews.Content: i got this phone because of the built in battery which is supposed to last long well it doesnt and it goes dead too quickly and gets hot for no reason even if its not in use....

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: deyanira
Reviews.Content: The phone was refurbished but, the SIM card slot was broken it took me several minutes to remove my old SIM card. I had to take my phone to Verizon to get it replaced. The phone is an old version no longer in Verizon store, seller forgot to mention.It also had spots inside the screen that are visible when the phone is off or turning on. Overall the phone is in excellent condition, everything works well. I would give it 4 stars had it not been broken or bull of spots.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: K. Lamphier
Reviews.Content: Not sure why the seller lists it as coming with a 4G Sim Card, as Verizon told me this model did not normally come with a Sim Card; you have to purchase it from Verizon.Regardless, this phone is great; I got the sim card from Verizon and it's user friendly,  very reliable and I hope to use it for a long time, well past when my contract with Verizon allows me to get a new phone; I'd rather keep this one!

Reviews.Title: Very good phone

Reviews.Content: I really like this phone. When I unpacked it I was very surprise, it had absolutely no scratches. I got it with a charger and a 4G sim card. It was activated fine with no problems. Very good phone.

Reviews.Title: False advertisement
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: The phone does NOT come with a SIM card like advertised. I was trying to avoid the tedious task of going into the Verizon store to activate my phone, but now i am forced to, to obtain the SIM card which was advertised. and if you email the seller don't expect a courteous response. very poor customer service.

Reviews.Title: My first smart phone
Reviews.Author: James J. Stewart "Preachdude"
Reviews.Content: I did not realize that there would be a moderate learning curve to learn the Android system. Otherwise, I am pleased with this phone. The batter life could be better, but then that's why this phone is less expensive than the Razr Max. So long as I recharge the phone every night I have no power problems, though if I watched movies on this phone I can see how I would have to plug it in more.
